value.name: project_id
value.description: The project ID or project name.

value.name: name
value.description: The name of the build definition.

value.name: path
value.description: The folder path of the build definition.

value.name: agent_pool_name
value.description: The agent pool that should execute the build. Defaults to `Azure Pipelines`.

value.name: repository
value.description: A `repository` block as documented below.

value.name: ci_trigger
value.description: Continuous Integration trigger.

value.name: pull_request_trigger
value.description: Pull Request Integration Integration trigger.

value.name: variable_groups
value.description: A list of variable group IDs (integers) to link to the build definition.

value.name: variable
value.description: A list of `variable` blocks, as documented below.

value.name: name
value.description: The name of the variable.

value.name: value
value.description: The value of the variable.

value.name: secret_value
value.description: The secret value of the variable. Used when `is_secret` set to `true`.

value.name: is_secret
value.description: True if the variable is a secret. Defaults to `false`.

value.name: allow_override
value.description: True if the variable can be overridden. Defaults to `true`.

value.name: branch_name
value.description: The branch name for which builds are triggered. Defaults to `master`.

value.name: repo_id
value.description: The id of the repository. For `TfsGit` repos, this is simply the ID of the repository. For `Github` repos, this will take the form of `<GitHub Org>/<Repo Name>`. For `Bitbucket` repos, this will take the form of `<Workspace ID>/<Repo Name>`.

value.name: repo_type
value.description: The repository type. Valid values: `GitHub` or `TfsGit` or `Bitbucket` or `GitHub Enterprise`. Defaults to `GitHub`. If `repo_type` is `GitHubEnterprise`, must use existing project and GitHub Enterprise service connection.

value.name: service_connection_id
value.description: The service connection ID. Used if the `repo_type` is `GitHub` or `GitHubEnterprise`.

value.name: yml_path
value.description: The path of the Yaml file describing the build definition.

value.name: github_enterprise_url
value.description: The Github Enterprise URL. Used if `repo_type` is `GithubEnterprise`.

value.name: report_build_status
value.description: Report build status. Default is true.

value.name: use_yaml
value.description: Use the azure

value.name: override
value.description: Override the azure

value.name: batch
value.description: If you set batch to true, when a pipeline is running, the system waits until the run is completed, then starts another run with all changes that have not yet been built. Defaults to `true`.

value.name: branch_filter
value.description: The branches to include and exclude from the trigger.

value.name: path_filter
value.description: Specify file paths to include or exclude. Note that the wildcard syntax is different between branches/tags and file paths.

value.name: max_concurrent_builds_per_branch
value.description: The number of max builds per branch. Defaults to `1`.

value.name: polling_interval
value.description: How often the external repository is polled. Defaults to `0`.

value.name: polling_job_id
value.description: This is the ID of the polling job that polls the external repository. Once the build definition is saved/updated, this value is set.

value.name: use_yaml
value.description: Use the azure

value.name: initial_branch
value.description: When use_yaml is true set this to the name of the branch that the azure

value.name: forks
value.description: Set permissions for Forked repositories.

value.name: override
value.description: Override the azure

value.name: enabled
value.description: Build pull requests form forms of this repository.

value.name: share_secrets
value.description: Make secrets available to builds of forks.

value.name: auto_cancel
value.description: . Defaults to `true`.

value.name: branch_filter
value.description: The branches to include and exclude from the trigger.

value.name: path_filter
value.description: Specify file paths to include or exclude. Note that the wildcard syntax is different between branches/tags and file paths.

value.name: include
value.description: List of branch patterns to include.

value.name: exclude
value.description: List of branch patterns to exclude.

value.name: include
value.description: List of path patterns to include.

value.name: exclude
value.description: List of path patterns to exclude.

value.name: include
value.description: List of branch patterns to include.

value.name: exclude
value.description: List of branch patterns to exclude.
